name: ListOrderedMap_putAllTest
description: Unit tests for the putAll method of ListOrderedMap with different scenarios.

test_cases.name: testPutAllAtIndexValid
test_cases.description: Tests the putAll method with a valid index, ensuring the map contents are correctly inserted.

test_cases.name: testPutAllAtIndexInvalid
test_cases.description: Tests the putAll method with invalid indices, expecting IndexOutOfBoundsException to be thrown.

test_cases.name: testPutAllAtIndexWithExistingKeys
test_cases.description: Tests the putAll method with a map containing existing keys, ensuring the values are updated and new keys are added.

test_cases.name: testPutAllAtIndexEmptyMap
test_cases.description: Tests the putAll method with an empty map, ensuring the ListOrderedMap remains empty.
